title: Language Education Design Using Infographics: Implementation Strategy Based on the ADDIE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Usage Skills and Foundational Language Learning Competencies
context.additional_context: In smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, VR simulations integrate infographic creation and language learning.

learning_goals: Can explain an infographic design process for language learning by applying the five phases of the ADDIE model
Can produce effective infographics utilizing visual elements (text, icons, layout) in VR simulation environments
Through project-based assessment, learners can complete at least one infographic applicable to real-world language learning scenarios

resources: Mobile-Compatible Infographic Creation Tools (Canva, Piktochart Mobile Versions)
VR Simulation Platform (Unity3D-Based Mobile VR Environment)
Visual Aids Templates for Language Learning
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
